I found your Facebook security code in an email from security@facebook.com. Your security code is: **463820**

This email was received on May 15, 2024. Please note that there's also another email from April 12, 2024, but it appears to be from a different sender (security-facebook-com@gmail.com) and contains a password reset link rather than a security code.

Remember to only use this security code for legitimate Facebook authentication purposes, and if you didn't request this code, you can safely ignore it as mentioned in the email.
